title: The best Cyber Monday deals on tools | Save up to 40% on Park Tool, Topeak, Silca and Abbey
content:
Cyber Monday is here and there are deals to be had on a range of tools and maintenance products from brands such as Park Tool, Topeak, Pro, Silca and even Abbey Bike Tools.

Read on for our pick of the best Cyber Monday tool deals and secure yourself a bargain.

Best Cyber Monday bike tool deals

Park Tool CT-3.3 – £34.99 £29.74 (save 15%)

Park Tool

There’s no room in life for poor-quality chain tools. The CT-3.3 is a professional shop-quality chain breaker that won’t break the bank.

It’s compatible from singlespeed all the way up to 13-speed chains and even works with SRAM FlatTop chains. Not all chain breakers are compatible with FlatTop chains because the pin sits in a slightly different location.

The tool has an investment cast steel body with a comfortable handle and the driving pin can be replaced if it ever breaks. The only thing the tool won’t do is peen Campagnolo chains.

  • Buy the Park Tool CT3.3 in the UK from Amazon for £29.74

Park Tool 8mm Hex Tool HT-8 – £7.98

Park Tool

It’s worth having long-handled 6, 8 and 10mm hex wrenches in your toolkit for removing stubborn pedals or crank bolts, rather than using a multi-tool, where you won’t have as much leverage.

Halfords has a great deal on this 8mm variant, the most common size you’ll find on pedals or crank bolts.

  • Buy the Park Tool HT-8 in the UK from Halfords for £7.98

Park Tool Ratcheting Metric Wrench Set MWR-SET – £149 £106 (save 29%)

Park Tool

Although most bolts on a bicycle are hex or Torx, you still get the occasional metric bolt too, for example on pedals, mudguard mounts, some saddle bolts or hydraulic disc brake compression nuts.

This set comes resplendent with a full set of wrenches from 6mm to 17mm, with an open-end and a ratcheting box-end.

The ratcheting end will save lots of time compared to having to remove and reinstall the tool in the correct position.

  • Buy the Park Tool MWR-SET in the UK from Wiggle for £106

Park Tool Home Mechanic Floor Pump PFP-8 – £54.99 £40.99 (save 25%)

Andy Lloyd

This no-frills pump is a tried-and-tested option from the Big Blue brand and is not only compatible with Presta and Schrader valves but also Dunlop.

The stand has a steel base with large foot pads and Park Tool says it’s equally at home in the garage, workshop or at the trailhead. You can rebuild it too if you ever need to because Park carries spares for it.

  • Buy the Park Tool PFP-8 in the UK from Freewheel for £40.99

Topeak Smart D2 Digital Gauge – £32.99 £20.99 (save 36%)

James Huang/BikeRadar

Tyre pressure gauges help ensure you have the exact amount of air you are aiming for in each tyre, which is critical for mountain bike and gravel bike tyre pressures. They offer greater accuracy than a traditional track pump.

Topeak’s Smart D2 gauge can read up to 250psi and will work with both Presta and Schrader valves on mountain bike tyres, suspension forks and rear shocks.

  • Buy the Topeak Smart D2 Digital Gauge in the UK from Amazon for £20.99
  • Buy the Topeak Smart D2 Digital Gauge in the US from Amazon for $29.90

Ryder Innovation Groove Tool Pro with Chain Breaker – £49.99 £29.99 (save 40%)

Kaden Gardener / Our Media

This multi-tool incorporates a range of 1/4in bits, as well as a chain breaker. It can be mounted on your bike with the included ‘Slyder Sleeve’ mount, or you can just store it in your jersey pocket or saddlebag.

There’s even room for a spare quick link inside.

  • Buy the Ryder Innovation Groove Tool Pro in the UK from Freewheel for £29.99

Pro Bike Repair Stand – £149.99 £112.49 (save 25%)

Pro

A bike repair stand is a workshop staple for working on your bike and this option from Shimano’s subsidiary brand, Pro, is reduced for Cyber Monday.

The stand is constructed from lightweight alloy and is rated to carry up to a 30kg weight. The maximum height is 162cm and it folds down when not in use.

  • Buy the Pro Bike Repair Stand in the UK from Freewheel for £112.49

Silca Gravelero Mini-Pump – €90 €72 (save 20%)

Kaden Gardener / Our Media

Silca attracted many raised eyebrows when it launched this gravel-specific mini-pump, but there’s nothing stopping you using it on the road or trails (although be aware it tops out at 70psi).

As you’d expect from the revered brand, the Gravelero uses an all-aluminium construction and a retractable hose, extending to 243mm in length. It uses the brand’s tried-and-tested thumb lock, reversible chuck for a secure connection to the valve.

  • Buy the Silca Gravelero direct from Silca for €72

Abbey Bike Tools

Abbey Bike Tools never has sales and only discounts its tools by 15 per cent in the USA every Black Friday. 2023 represents the first time Abbey products are simultaneously reduced in the UK via Saddleback. Here are some highlights:

Abbey Bike Tools Hanger Alignment Gauge –£235 £199.75 (save 15%)

Stan Portus / Our Media

This derailleur hanger alignment tool is claimed to be the “last hanger tool you’ll ever have to buy” and we can attest to this with its superlative performance, thanks to its rotating head and class-leading construction.

Unlike cheaper offerings, there is virtually no slop in the head of the tool, crucial for perfectly straightening bent derailleur hangers.

  • Buy the Abbey Bike Tools Hanger Alignment Gauge in the UK from Saddleback for £199.75
  • Buy the Abbey Bike Tools Hanger Alignment Gauge in the US direct from Abbey for $205

Abbey Bike Tools Dual Sided Crombie Tool – £52 £44.20 (save 15%)

Oscar Huckle / Our Media

The Crombie cassette lockring tool essentially kick-started the brand and revolutionised designs with its elegant ‘why didn’t I think of that’ approach.

Although many carbon copies have been made since its release, the Crombie still stands tall thanks to its 17-2 precision-machined stainless steel construction.

It’s designed to pair with the brand’s WhipIt chain whip that stores conveniently in the Crombie’s handle.

And it’s proven plenty durable too, with technical writer Oscar Huckle including it in his High-Mileage Hero workshop tool round-up.

  • Buy the Abbey Bike Tools Crombie in the UK from Saddleback for £44.20
  • Buy the Abbey Bike Tools Crombie in the US direct from Abbey for $42
author: Oscar Huckle
